org.apache.juneau.assertions

Class FluentIntegerAssertion<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion
      • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentAssertion<R>
        • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentIntegerAssertion<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - The return type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntegerAssertion

    public class FluentIntegerAssertion<R>
extends FluentAssertion<R>
    Used for fluent assertion calls against integers.
    Example:

    // Validates the response status code is 200 or 404. client .get(URL) .run() .assertStatus().isAny(200,404);

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      • msg

        public FluentIntegerAssertion<R> msg(String msg,
                                     Object... args)
        Description copied from class: Assertion
        Allows to to specify the assertion failure message.

        String can contain "{msg}" to represent the original message.

        Overrides:
        msg in class FluentAssertion<R>
        Parameters:
        msg - The assertion failure message.
        args - Optional message arguments.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).
